CLUE: Traditionally the author of the third Gospel
FOUND IN: In-depth expertise in New Testament writings, specifically the Gospels of Matthew, Mark, Luke, and John.
Westminster (The Houses of Parliament are located in this London borough)
Limbo – The state of being uncertain, especially about one's future; used metaphorically as a place where souls might be held temporarily before going to heaven or hell.
Whiteness – a synonym for what bleach typically achieves, but could be considered an outcome rather than the process itself.
Abbess - A woman who is the head of an abbey of nuns within the Christian Church
